yup but, 2000 year ago they changed the calendar, prolly because of  some things important, i guess they started to sent people to school on sunday all life long, not sure if they called it school back in the days tho' but nut that much people were able to read and write (properly "") it seem, also they removed multiple divinity for single divinity, having a lot of divinity was bit messy it seem within you own "frontier" and wasn't helpfull to war outside the frontiers (yup no one can war other, if peoples already fight inside, that's dumb you know ?), so they started wrote some book about this single divinity in various languages so everyone could know there only one divinity and not many like before, later once in while because death by birth ratio around 4/5 they used to sent men at war to keep thing equals for every remaining living thingy, to do so they argued that's this single divinity wasn't the same because the doG speak one languages not the other, the doG is dumb you know.

I do wonder who still only go to school only sunday 2000 year later and the ratio of people that can read and write without gettin' it (still " ")
